label: How to create a knowledge base

link.description: Creating a knowledge base is a crucial step in developing effective AI agents with Gaia. This page outlines various methods to build vector collections from your proprietary and private knowledge, ensuring your AI has access to the most relevant information. Whether you're working with plain text, markdown files, structured data pairs, PDFs, or web content. Gaia provides flexible options to import and transform your data into a powerful knowledge base. Each section below details a specific approach, allowing you to choose the method that best suits your data format and needs. By following these guides, you'll be able to create a rich, customized knowledge foundation for your AI applications.
